title: DRAVEN BUG
body: DRAVEN AXE RANDOMLY DISAPPEAR .... IDK IT RANDOMLY DISSAPPEAR ITS A BUG AND MY FRIEND SAW IT HE SAID ITS A BUG AND I SAW IT ITS A BUUUGGGG PLS FIX IT RIOT{{champion:119}}

replies.body: This has happened to me before.  Seems like it happens when you cancel your attack as the target dies from another source.  I most commonly see this when I'm with a melee support with a relic shield.

Is it when you cancel an AA at the very last time?
I faced that bug sometimes and it felt like it was the case
Happens to me alot, its really annoying , i thought it wasnt a bug but i guess it is?...
